In England, in the seven days to 01 April, there were 23,078 new confirmed cases (41.0 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 25 March, there were 31,664 new cases, and so the new cases have decreased by 27% (8,586 fewer cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 06 April is 3,816,361 (6,780.2 cases per 100,000 population).
